channel.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
channel.description: If someone tries to post an advertisement, have a mod check it over before it gets published. RSC servers aren't released every day so it's not going to be a huge issue and it'll stop all the RS2 fags from being able to advertise their shit.

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

RSCShadow:

It’s not like RS2 users are going to jump through all these hoops. They should at least try this anyway.

When it generates them players, they will do what they need to get them. At least provide other ways it’d be useful other than preventing a few spam threads.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

It’s not like RS2 users are going to jump through all these hoops. They should at least try this anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:20, topic:409643”][quote author=Not_a_bot link=topic=510918.msg3708215#msg3708215 date=1313180322]

I don’t see it working out. You would give mods more work and more pestering by server owners, and thread owners can still edit/add their posts if they wanted to advertise their RS2 servers. I’ll even go far enough as saying some might cry wolf if they think for a second mods are being biased.
[/quote][quote]RSC servers aren’t released every day.[/quote]And I doubt anyone is going to go through the trouble of making a fake RSC advert that the mods wouldn’t be able to see through.

Implying it’s difficult to rip screen shots of another private server, add bits of info…and/or mods knowing the difference given they were picked from the RS2 section…

Doesn’t matter there’s still going to be less RS2 servers than there are now. And also maybe this isn’t the only thing that’s going to fix that section but it’ll sure help.[/quote]

Again, implying its hard enough to post an advertisement on an existing thread. You don’t see that it’s just creating more work for very little output. If anything, you’ll be pissing off server owners who end up seeing their threads with the new spam.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:18, topic:409643”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=510918.msg3708209#msg3708209 date=1313180080]

I don’t see it working out. You would give mods more work and more pestering by server owners, and thread owners can still edit/add their posts if they wanted to advertise their RS2 servers. I’ll even go far enough as saying some might cry wolf if they think for a second mods are being biased.
[/quote][quote]RSC servers aren’t released every day.[/quote]And I doubt anyone is going to go through the trouble of making a fake RSC advert that the mods wouldn’t be able to see through.

Implying it’s difficult to rip screen shots of another private server, add bits of info…and/or mods knowing the difference given they were picked from the RS2 section…[/quote]
Doesn’t matter there’s still going to be less RS2 servers than there are now. And also maybe this isn’t the only thing that’s going to fix that section but it’ll sure help.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:15, topic:409643”][quote]If anything that’s a reason to have it less regulated. Oh no two retarded rs2 kids are posting rs2 servers I hope that
doesn’t knock down the only rsc server back to the second page!%%!!%!. If anything it’s the only thing that keeps the rsc server section alive.[/quote]If maybe you’d look at the forum instead of bitching you’d see that like 90% of it is RS2 advertisements.[/quote]

Implying I was bitching at all. Yeah it is so what? there’s only one or two servers to be advertise. If anything mods should do their job and ban this people instead of just locking it up.

Read full topic

I don’t see it working out. You would give mods more work and more pestering by server owners, and thread owners can still edit/add their posts if they wanted to advertise their RS2 servers. I’ll even go far enough as saying some might cry wolf if they think for a second mods are being biased.
[/quote][quote]RSC servers aren’t released every day.[/quote]And I doubt anyone is going to go through the trouble of making a fake RSC advert that the mods wouldn’t be able to see through.[/quote]

Implying it’s difficult to rip screen shots of another private server, add bits of info…and/or mods knowing the difference given they were picked from the RS2 section…

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:16, topic:409643”]I don’t see it working out. You would give mods more work and more pestering by server owners, and thread owners can still edit/add their posts if they wanted to advertise their RS2 servers. I’ll even go far enough as saying some might cry wolf if they think for a second mods are being biased.[/quote]

RSC servers aren’t released every day.
And I doubt anyone is going to go through the trouble of making a fake RSC advert that the mods wouldn’t be able to see through.

item.title: RSC Advertisement Verification
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

If anything that's a reason to have it less regulated. Oh no two retarded rs2 kids are posting rs2 servers I hope that doesn't knock down the only rsc server back to the second page!%%!!%!. If anything it's the only thing that keeps the rsc server section alive.
If maybe you'd look at the forum instead of bitching you'd see that like 90% of it is RS2 advertisements.

Read full topic
